# 知乎问答：为什么感觉现在全中国都在加班，到底都在加什么？

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme
zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme
zhihu-wenda-weishenme-ganjue-xianzai-quan-zhongguo-du-zai-jiaban-daodi-du-zai-jia-shenme <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
